name: Escape to Princess
description:
Grown-up life is dreary and dissatisfying, and you should get to be a princess if you want to. Claim your epic adventure and become a hero of legend. When the day has been won and your accolades received, will you go home or stick around a little longer? All up to you. 

Escape to Princess (E2P) is a CYOA-style interactive story in written gender-neutral second person.
